tool_description: Calculates actual costs for completed work orders including labor, materials, equipment, and overhead expenses.

work_order_id.description: Work order ID to calculate costs for

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid hours worked: actual_hours_worked must be greater than 0.
Invalid material costs: All material costs must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid overhead rate: overhead_rate must be between 0 and 1.
Negative cost values: Equipment rental and travel expenses cannot be negative.
Cost calculation already exists: Costs have already been calculated for this work order.
usage: Provide work_order_id and actual_hours_worked. Add material_costs array, equipment_rental_cost, travel_expenses, and overhead_rate as needed. Returns detailed cost breakdown and totals.

total_labor_cost.description: Total cost of labor based on hours and rates

total_material_cost.description: Total cost of all materials used

cost_variance.description: Variance from original estimate (positive = over budget)

cost_efficiency.description: Cost efficiency rating: excellent, good, acceptable, poor
